Summon Commander:#3268 Bakeneko
The caster contacts and makes a deal with a Bakeneko, a ghost cat of Shinuyama. The Bakeneko is a cat that has lived for decades and developed shapeshifting abilities and magical powers. Some are prone to setting things on fire, others reanimate dead corpses to use in their nefarious schemes. Bakeneko are attuned to magic and their powers are greater in lands of magic.
